archimate:Requirement.name: SA.2.3.5c: c) providing additional authentication for sensitive transactions or procedures (e.g. when making payments or performing high-value funds transfer) to prevent attacks, such as man-in-the-middle attacks.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
